feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-06-17T19:57:48.185589Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;Bullshit Jobs by David Graeber (2018)</stitle>; <id>;https://theanarchistlibrary.org/library/david-graeber-bullshit-jobs</id>; <updated>; 2023-06-17T18:56:58.881506Z</updated>; <link href="https://theanarchistlibrary.org/library/david-graeber-bullshit-jobs"/>; <author>; <name>;TotalCrackpot</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=TotalCrackpot</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://theanarchistlibrary.org/library/dg -david-graeber-bullshit-jobs-2.jpg" style="宽度：220px；高度：242px；" />;<br />;这篇文章讨论了废话工作的现象，这些工作似乎没有真正的目的或对社会没有太大贡献。作者质疑这些工作是否真的无用，以及从事这些工作的人是否意识到这一点。这篇文章还探讨了为什么技术并没有像约翰梅纳德凯恩斯所预测的那样导致工作时间减少，而是创造了更多毫无意义的工作。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#bullshit-jobs-by-david-graeber-2018" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36373190" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GB Studio：适用于 GameBoy 的拖放式复古游戏创建器</stitle>; <id>;https://www.gbstudio.dev/</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-17T17:56:58.883796Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.gbstudio.dev/"/>; <author>; <name>;CharlesW</name>; <uri>;https://news. ycombinator.com/user?id=CharlesW</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.gbstudio.dev/img/home/screenshot_win_1_v3.png" 风格= “宽度：220px；高度：173px；” />;<br />;拖放式游戏创建器，无需任何编程知识，可视化脚本。支持多种游戏类型。创建真正的 ROM 文件并在任何 GB 模拟器上播放。导出具有出色移动控件的网络，上传到 Itch.io 并与世界分享您的游戏。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gb-studio-drag-and-drop-retro-game-creator-for-gameboy" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36372284" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;更新：U+237C ⍼ &Angzarr;</stitle>; <id>;https://ionathan.ch/2023/06/06/ angarr.html</id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T12:56:58.886402Z</updated>; <link href="https://ionathan.ch/2023/06/06/angarr.html"/>; <作者>; <name>;g0xA52A2A</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=g0xA52A2A</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;ISO/IEC JTC1/SC2 /WG2 N2191 将 U+237C ⍼ 添加到 Unicode 标准，该标准从 STIX 项目中获取字符，该项目的字符表由 Barbara Beeton 编译，从 ISO/IEC TR 9573-13 中获取字符。本文的其余部分讨论了发现此信息的过程和参考的来源。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#update-u-237c-angzarr" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator。 com/item?id=36369553" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml" >; <title type="text">;从字母表中删除了哪个字符？ (2020)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.dictionary.com/e/ampersand/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T13:56:58.886943Z</updated>; <link href=" https://www.dictionary.com/e/ampersand/"/>; <author>; <name>;paulkrush</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=paulkrush</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.dictionary.com/e/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/20200831_redBlueStates_1000x700-790x310.png" style="width: 220 像素；高度：87 像素；" />;<br />;与号 (&) 曾经是字母表中的第 27 个成员。它的名字源于字符的形状，它比 & 符号早了 1500 多年。在 1800 年代初期，学童背诵 ABC 以符号结束字母表。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#what-c​​haracter-was-removed-from-the-alphabet-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36370108" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;超新星如何爆炸 (1985) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https://astro.uconn.edu/wp-content/uploads/ sites/2830/2020/10/Bethe_Brown_How-a-Supernova-Explodes.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T17:56:58.887422Z</更新>; <link href="https://astro.uconn .edu/wp-content/uploads/sites/2830/2020/10/Bethe_Brown_How-a-Supernova-Explodes.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;rwmj</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator .com/user?id=rwmj</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-a-supernova-explodes-1985- pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36363718" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;如何组建罗马军队：dilectus</stitle>; <id>;https://acoup.blog/2023/06/16/collections-how-to-raise-a-roman-army-the-dilectus/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T16:56： 58.887893Z</updated>; <link href="https://acoup.blog/2023/06/16/collections-how-to-raise-a-roman-army-the-dilectus/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;文明</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=civilitty</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// i0.wp.com/acoup.blog/wp-content/uploads/2023/06/Altar-of-Domitius-Ahenobarb.jpg?resize=1024%2C543&ssl=1" style="width: 220px; height: 117px;" />;<br />;罗马人在中世纪通过一个叫做 dilectus 的过程来招募军团，这个过程涉及罗马主要官员选择士兵。这个过程可以根据 Polybius 和 Livy 等资料重建. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-to-raise-a-roman-army-the-dilectus" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href= "https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371596" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews .betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;小芯片是否足以拯救摩尔定律？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.eetimes.com/are-chiplets-enough-to -save-moores-law/</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T16:56:58.888346Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.eetimes.com/are-chiplets-enough-to -save-moores-law/"/>; <author>; <name>;transpute</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=transpute</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://www.eetimes.com/wp-content/uploads/MediaTek-and-Nvidia-Chiplet-Announcement.jpg?w=640&resize=640%2C340" style="width : 220px; height: 117px;" />;<br />;Nvidia 将向联发科技提供 GPU 小芯片，用于车内汽车应用，添加对小芯片的验证作为一个概念，以帮助保持摩尔定律的活力。小芯片已经存在了一段时间，并允许使用不同工艺节点组装不同的芯片。然而，由于缺乏接口标准，小芯片的商业化受到阻碍。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#are-chiplets-enough-to-save -moores-law" target="_blank">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371651" target="_blank">;[评论]</ a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Gitless：一个构建在 Git 之上的简单 VCS </stitle>; <id>;https://gitless.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T14:56:58.888808Z</updated>; <link href="https://gitless.com/" />; <author>; <name>;hosteur</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hosteur</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img 源="https://gitless.com/gl-logo.png" style="宽度: 220px; height: 221px;" />;<br />;Gitless 是一个构建在 Git 之上的简单版本控制系统。它提供了一个友好的命令行界面，允许您跟踪、取消跟踪和忽略文件。Gitless 与 Git 兼容，并且可以与 GitHub 或任何 Git 托管服务一起使用。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gitless-a-simple-vcs-built-on-top-of-git" target="_blank" >;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36370225" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;日本生物质企业利用微生物解决废物处理问题</stitle>; <id>;https:// mainichi.jp/english/articles/20230428/p2g/00m/0bu/057000c</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T15:56:58.889295Z</更新>; <link href="https://mainichi.jp /english/articles/20230428/p2g/00m/0bu/057000c"/>; <author>; <name>;fagnerbrack</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fagnerbrack</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mainichi.jp/vol1/2023/04/28/20230428p2g00m0bu054000p/6.jpg?1" style="width: 220px; height: 146px;" />;<br />;一家名为 Komham Inc. 的日本初创公司开发了一种利用微生物分解有机废物的方法，减少了温室气体排放并为环境保护做出了贡献。该公司提供的细菌可以处理 98% 的有机物废物在短短 24 小时内转化为水和二氧化碳。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#japanese-biomass-venture-using-microorganisms-to-tackle-waste-disposal" target="_blank" >;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36370817" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;伦敦地铁点阵字体</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ petykowski/London-Underground-Dot-Matrix-Typeface</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T05:56:58.889809Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/petykowski/London-Underground -Dot-Matrix-Typeface"/>; <author>; <name>;nickswalker</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=nickswalker</uri>; </author>; <content type= “html”>;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/petykowski/London-Underground-Dot-Matrix-Typeface/master/resources/examples/London-Underground-Regular.png" style="width: 220像素； height: 131px;" />;<br />;一组采用 TFL 地下网络风格的点阵字体。每个字体粗细代表 TFL 到达板和机车车辆 LED 公告板上的独特字体。<a href="https //hackernews.betacat.io/#london-underground-dot-matrix-typeface" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item? id=36367667" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题类型="text">;Hetzner ARM64 服务器回顾及 WebP 云服务体验</stitle>; <id>;https://blog.webp.se/hetzner-arm64-en/</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-17T09:56:58.890297Z</updated>; <link href="https://blog.webp.se/hetzner-arm64-en/"/>; <author>; <name>;novakwok</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=novakwok</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://blog.webp.se/hetzner-arm64/ scaleway-c1.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 193px;" />;<br />;Scaleway 于 2015 年推出了基于 ARM64 处理器的 C1 服务器。在 2020 年停产 ARM64 机器后，Scaleway 于 2023 年恢复提供配备 ARM64 处理器的服务器。Hetzner 还提供 CAX 下的 ARM64 云服务器线，提供物超所值的服务。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#review-of-hetzner-arm64-servers-and-experience-of-webp-cloud-services-on-them" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36368586" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content >; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;GPT-4 在 Pitch Deck 有效性方面优于人类</stitle>; <id >;https://clarifycapital.com/the-future-of-investment-pitching</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T18:56:58.892813Z</更新>; <link href="https://clarifycapital. com/the-future-of-investment-pitching"/>; <author>; <name>;moglito</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=moglito</uri>; </author >; <content type="html">;<img src="https://clarifycapital.com/assets/study/future-of-investment-pitching/asset1-16f302451e537d8b3f6fcbdc12aa148177550492f463497df525ccf25c5cb82d.png" style="宽度：22 0像素； height: 153px;" />;<br />;总体而言，投资者和企业主表示，GPT-4 生成的推介稿比人类制作的推介稿更具说服力 2 倍。总体而言，投资者和企业主在阅读 GPT 后投资的可能性高出 3 倍-4 pitch deck 比读完人类的 pitch deck。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#gpt-4-outperforms-humans-in-pitch-deck-effectiveness" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36372808" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Planescape: Torment pitch 文档 (1997) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https:// rpgwatch.com/files/Files/00-0208/Torment_Vision_Statement_1997.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T10:56:58.893818Z</更新>; <link href="https://rpgwatch.com/files /Files/00-0208/Torment_Vision_Statement_1997.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;podiki</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=podiki</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;玩家创建一个角色并选择盟友加入他们的队伍。游戏设置在 Planescape 宇宙中，一系列围绕中心城市 Sigil 旋转的平面。这座城市充满了通向存在的任何地方的门户。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#planescape-torment-pitch-document-1997-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36351277" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;问HN：为什么Apple拒绝向macOS添加窗口捕捉？</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36368990< /id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T11:56:58.894293Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36368990"/>; <author>; <name>;retskrad </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=retskrad</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;老实说令人震惊的是，到 2023 年，MacOS 仍然有一个不存在的窗口管理系统。忘记我们在外面。为 Apple 工作的数以万计的员工怎么不每天向执行团队发送对此的反馈？ <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-why-does-apple-refuse-to-add-window-snapping-to-macos" target="_blank">;[总结]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36368990" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：发送照片作为明信片发送到地球上的任何地方只需 3 美元</stitle>; <id>;https: //postcardbot.com/</id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T15:56:58.894779Z</updated>; <link href="https://postcardbot.com/"/>; <author>; <name>;traviswingo </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=traviswingo</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;向世界任何地方发送精美的自定义明信片，通过您的手机，只需 2.99 美元。没有可下载的应用程序 - 将照片发送到下面的号码以开始 🙂。使用我们的号码时，回复HELP求助，STOP退订，START继续，UNPOST取消重新开始。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-text-a-photo-to-send-as-a-postcard-anywhere-on-earth-for-3" target="_blank ">;[总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371168" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;证明基础知识 (2017) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;https:/ /theory.stanford.edu/~jvondrak/MATH108-2017/Proofs.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T10:56:58.895243Z</更新>; <link href="https://theory.stanford .edu/~jvondrak/MATH108-2017/Proofs.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;waldarbeiter</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=waldarbeiter</uri>; < /author>; <content type="html">;这是一个基于证明的课程。我们将在课堂上给出严格的证明，你将被要求在作业和考试中证明你的答案是正确的。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#basics-of-proofs-2017-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news. ycombinator.com/item?id=36353322" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed. xml">; <title type="text">;HouseWatch：用于监控和管理 ClickHouse 集群的开源工具</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/PostHog/HouseWatch</id>; <updated>;2023- 06-17T12:56:58.895705Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/PostHog/HouseWatch"/>; <author>; <name>;yakkomajuri</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=yakkomajuri</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PostHog/HouseWatch/main/overview.png " style="宽度：220px；高度：122px；" />;<br />;HouseWatch 是一个用于监控和管理 ClickHouse 集群的开源工具。它提供磁盘使用统计信息，允许运行查询，并提供集群管理功能。该工具仍处于测试阶段，在生产中使用它时应谨慎行事。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#housewatch-open-source-tool-for-monitoring-and-managing-clickhouse-clusters" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36369530" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;不要与警察交谈 (2012) [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/ watch?v=d-7o9xYp7eE</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T15:56:58.896647Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d-7o9xYp7eE "/>; <author>; <name>;Aerbil313</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Aerbil313</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube.com/embed/d-7o9xYp7eE" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#dont -talk-to-police-2012-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371237" target="_blank" >;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;问 HN：有Google 搜索现在也为您切换到无限滚动了吗？</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36370725</id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T14:56:58.897106Z </updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36370725"/>; <author>; <name>;KomoD</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=KomoD</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;几周前，谷歌搜索停止在底部显示页码，但没有无限滚动。用户手动将设置更改为无限滚动，但它神秘地返回到多页结果。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-has-google-search-switched-to-infinite-scrolling-for-you-too-now" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36370725" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：State Trooper – 用于 Go 的微型、简洁的状态机</stitle>; <id>;https: //github.com/hishamk/statetrooper</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T14:56:58.897565Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/hishamk/statetrooper"/>; <作者>; <name>;hishamk</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=hishamk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https ://opengraph.githubassets.com/379ed3199d370a250f28f67dd3259047976f5873448907568bc7657744e26d43/hishamk/statetrooper" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;StateTrooper 是一个 Go 包，它提供了一个用于管理状态的有限状态机 (FSM)。它允许您根据预定义的规则定义和执行状态转换。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-state-trooper-tiny-no-frills-state-machine-for-go" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36370396" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;问 HN：用你最喜欢的语言编写的最优雅的代码库有哪些？</stitle>; <id>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36370684</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T14:56:58.898049Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =36370684"/>; <author>; <name>;debanjan16</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=debanjan16</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;你最喜欢的语言可以是任何语言——Lisp、Python、C、Haskell 等。哪些代码库是用你最喜欢的语言编写的最优雅的代码库，新手可以从中学到一些东西？ <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-what-are-some-of-the-most-elegant-codebases-in-your-favorite-language" target="_blank">; [总结]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36370684" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; < entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;他们只是盗版了我的开源 8088 BIOS</stitle>; <id>;https://arstechnica。 com/civis/threads/brand-new-laptop-recreates-1981%E2%80%99s-ibm-pc-complete-with-8088-cpu-and-640kb-of-ram.1492119/page-3#post- 41883267</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T14:56:58.898519Z</更新>; <link href="https://arstechnica.com/civis/threads/brand-new-laptop-recreates-1981%E2 %80%99s-ibm-pc-complete-with-8088-cpu-and-640kb-of-ram.1492119/page-3#post-41883267"/>; <author>; <name>;justsomehnguy</name>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=justsomehnguy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.arstechnica.net/civis/data /附件/12/12744-b3ab177545f6b84d1ddee1f009651ddf.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;DOSBox 主要是为运行游戏而设计的，缺少对生产力应用程序有用的功能。但是，有一些 DOSBox 分支为非游戏 DOS 程序添加了功能。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#they-just-pirated-my-open-source-8088-bios" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news .ycombinator.com/item?id=36370257" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;告诉 HN：Comcast/Xfinity 发生大范围 DNS 中断</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371358</id>; <更新>;2023-06-17T16:56:58.899000Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371358"/>; <author>; <name>;Doches</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Doches</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;有几个可用的 DNS 提供商，包括 Google、Quad9、Cloudflare、AdGuard DNS、Control D、OpenDNS Home、CleanBrowsing、备用 DNS、DNS.WATCH、Comodo Secure DNS、CenturyLink (Level3)、CIRA Canadian Shield、OpenNIC、Dyn、Yandex DNS、Hurricane Electric、Neustar、家庭 DNS、FlashStart 和 Freenom世界。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#tell-hn-comcast-xfinity-is-having-a-widespread-dns-outage" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371358" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Firefox 116 应该有实验性的 PipeWire 摄像头支持</stitle>; <id>;https://www.phoronix.com/news/Firefox- 116-PipeWire-Camera</id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T16:56:58.899925Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.phoronix.com/news/Firefox-116-PipeWire-Camera "/>; <author>; <name>;LinuxBender</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=LinuxBender</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.phoronix.com/assets/categories/pipewire.webp" style="宽度：220px；高度：221px；" />;<br />;Mozilla 的 Firefox 116 网络浏览器设置为包括对 Linux 用户的实验性 PipeWire 摄像头捕获支持。此功能需要在“about:config”中启用，因为它仍处于实验阶段。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#firefox-116-should-have-experimental-pipewire-camera-support" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href=" https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36371378" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews. betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Show HN：使用 512MB RAM 探索大型语言模型</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/jncraton/languagemodels</id>; <updated>;2023-06-17T13:56:58.900839Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/jncraton/languagemodels"/>; <author>; <name>;jncraton</name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jncraton</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/dc7f2eb4ee14e683361bb00bca88e6cf899ab61cc5ce8a04982ad7da97a116f0/jncraton/ languagemodels" style="宽度：220px；高度：110px；" />;<br />;Python 构建块可在任何具有 512MB RAM 的计算机上探索大型语言模型。该软件包旨在让学习者和教育工作者尽可能简单地探索大型语言模型如何与现代软件开发相交。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-explore-large-language-models-with-512mb-of-ram" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36369934" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
